product_name: SmartWool Microweight Long-Sleeve Zip-T Shirt - Wool - Men's
long_description: Zip it up for warmth or zip it down for ventilation, the SmartWool Microweight Zip T shirt for men makes it easy to enjoy your favorite activities. Fine merino wool helps maintain a comfortable temperature whether the day is hot, cold or in between. 8 in. zipper protects skin via a zipper guard. Chafe-free flatlock seams enhance comfort. Fabric protects skin from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 30. Shaped bottom hem enhances fit. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Formfitting SmartWool Microweight Zip T for men offers a minimalist fit.
short_description: Zip it up for warmth or zip it down for ventilation, the SmartWool Microweight Zip T shirt for men makes it easy to enjoy your favorite activities.
